name: check_file_null_values
description: Check the number and percentage of missing (NULL) values for each column in a CSV, Excel, JSON, or JSONL file.

file_path.description: Path to the input file (.csv, .xlsx, .json, or .jsonl).

sheet_name.description: Sheet name or index (only used for Excel files).

save_to_file.description: Optional path to save the result as .csv, .xlsx, .json, or .jsonl.
